meanings.definition: A tuft of hair that grows in a direction different from the rest of the hair.
meanings.sent1: Her cowlick always sticks up in the front.
meanings.sent2: I can never tame this unruly cowlick at the back of my head.
meanings.sent3: The cowlick seemed to have a mind of its own, defying all attempts to smooth it down.
meanings.sent4: His cowlick was like a rebellious flag, waving against the flow of the other hair.
meanings.sent5: The cowlick resembled a tiny whirlwind amidst the calm sea of hair.

meanings.definition: A stubborn lock of hair that stands up or grows in a different direction.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, she wrestles with her cowlick to make it behave.
meanings.sent2: His cowlick always points upwards, no matter how much he tries to flatten it.
meanings.sent3: The cowlick seemed to have a mischievous personality, refusing to blend in with the rest of the hair.
meanings.sent4: The cowlick was like a lone tree standing tall in a field of grass.
meanings.sent5: Despite its small size, the cowlick commanded attention with its defiance.
